originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Kaplan for over 20 years. He is not just a consummate professional, but a warm and inviting man who does his best to take the pain out of dentistry. His staff is also excellent, particularly the dental hygienists (Hello, Tatiana!) I cannot recommend this dentist highly enough!

text.text: I have been seeing Dr. Kaplan for over 20 years. He is not just a consummate professional, but a warm and inviting man who does his best to take the pain out of dentistry. His staff is also excellent, particularly the dental hygienists (Hello, Tatiana!) I cannot recommend this dentist highly enough!

originalText.text: Dr. Kaplan and his staff were absolutely wonderful. The examination and consultation were thorough and highly professional. I felt I was in the hands of someone who actually cared about the condition of my gums. He was a second opinion because the first doctor I visited told me I needed a great deal of work, and the cost was prohibitive. Dr Kaplan took the time to explain the state of my gums, that they were fine (the first doctor I went to told me the opposite) and that all I needed was a deep cleaning. Aside from feeling relieved I also feel as though my faith has been restored.

originalText.text: I’ve been seeing Dr Kaplan for more than 20 years. Dr. Kaplan is the best. Best bedside manner. Reassuring. Takes great care of my teeth. I can recommend Dr Kaplan and his staff warmly.

text.text: I’ve been seeing Dr Kaplan for more than 20 years. Dr. Kaplan is the best. Best bedside manner. Reassuring. Takes great care of my teeth. I can recommend Dr Kaplan and his staff warmly.

originalText.text: Don’t even bother to call!!! Called in two occasions. One time took my info and never called back. Called again and made me call 3  back because the person who made the appointments was in lunch. When finally got a hold of them they put me on hold in the middle of the conversation. If it’s like this before you are a patient a I can’t imagine once you’re there. Trust the bad reviews and RUN!

originalText.text: I hate dental cleanings (who doesn’t?) so I can’t give 5 stars no how no way. However my teeth look and feel great after the torturous cleaning and I’ve been coming to Dr K for almost 3 years and my teeth are in great shape thanks to him.
